name: TokenVestingUpgradeSafe
description: TokenVesting. A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a cliff and vesting period. Optionally revocable by the owner.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

eventDecorators.name: TokenVestingRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

eventDecorators.name: TokensReleased
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted that client terminates the service if the hash(s1) is wrong. Or cloud terminates the service if client does not confirms hash(s1) in time.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token which is being vested.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: revoke
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token which is being vested.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
